entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is the son of Mr. and Mrs. Weasley. He is mentioned as surveying his mother with amazement.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is Harry's father. He got caught by Apollyon Pringle during a nighttime stroll.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is Harry's mother. She had been for a nighttime stroll with her husband.

entities.name: apollyon pringle
entities.description: Apollyon Pringle was the caretaker in the past. He caught Mr. Weasley during a nighttime stroll.

entities.name: amos diggory
entities.description: Amos Diggory is mentioned as looking around and talking to Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character. He is being talked to by Bill and Amos Diggory.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley got caught by Apollyon Pringle during a nighttime stroll.
Harry is talking to Bill in the Great Hall.
